{{modalTitle}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MdbModalRef,MdbModalService } from 'mdb-angular-ui-kit/modal'; import { ToastrService } from 'ngx-toastr'; import { NgxSpinnerService } from 'ngx-spinner'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-edit', templateUrl: './add-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-edit.component.css'] }) export class AddEditComponent { public emp: any; public modalTitle: string=''; constructor(private apiService:SharedService,public modal: MdbModalRef, private toast: ToastrService, private loader: NgxSpinnerService){ } ngOnInit() : void{ } }
